text: @anusharavi10 @zoo_bear @sriramulubjp Not a grand welcome. He is actually setting a stage for a possible #COVID19 epicenter. Sir, at least for your vote sake, save people; don't put their lives at risk. Marriage-50 max; funeral-20 max; liquor shop-queue in kilometers; political rally-in 000s?! Wow.
